name: Breadcrumbs (Rilabeast, Er4din, GamerZila9001)
description: Another calm day at the park... You have 3 lives to help Granny Bacon feed the pigeons by giving them bread without 'accidentally' murdering them. Throw bread in front of the pigeons but not at them as to not scare them away. Also, watch out and don't feed the pigeons rocks which somehow got mixed up with the bread. (Warning:  incorrect resolution on some monitors due to the malfunction of WebGL when building the game. Try Full screen.) Also make sure not to waste any breadcrumbs or you will lose points.
